attributes.action: More Funding for Police to investigate Stolen Survey Equipment, Plant, & Tools
attributes.additional_details:
The Police have done the best they can with little or no resources, this cannot continue.
Response times are often poor & crimes are screened out with no investigation
Stolen items are regularly identified as being sold online or in 'Pawn brokers' both inside & outside of the UK 
The Government must acknowledge this serious issue and allocate additional funds to the Police to deal with this organised crime.
People are losing their livelihoods & nsurance is now extremely high, or not available.
attributes.background:
This MultiMillion pound Organised Crime is growing year on year, affecting peoples livelihoods & the UK economy 
There have been serious injuries & threats with knives & weapons during robberies, how long is it before there is a fatality? 
The Government must give more funding to Police operations
